item.title: Trump, Epstein files & Streisand effect: Why Republicans have failed to kill the story

media:content.media:title: Demonstrators call for the release of the Epstein files outside the Capitol in Washington, on Tuesday, Sept. 2, 2025. (Eric Lee/The New York Times)

In part of a trove of emails released by members of Congress on Nov. 12, 2025, an excerpt from an April 2, 2011 email sent by Jeffrey Epstein to Ghislaine Maxwell. Democrats on the House Oversight Committee released emails suggesting that Donald Trump knew more about Jeffrey Epstein’s activities than he has acknowledged. (via The New York Times) — NO SALES. FOR EDITORIAL USE ONLY with NYT STORY EPSTEIN-EMAILS by EDER and CONFESSORE of NOV. 12, 2025. ALL OTHER USE PROHIBITED. —
